generated_body: In the article titled "Judge calls USC dad a 'thief,' gives longest prison sentence so far in college admissions scandal," the user may expect to read about the latest developments in the high-profile college admissions scandal that has drawn significant media attention. The piece is likely to detail the judge's remarks during sentencing, including the rationale behind the lengthy prison term imposed on the father involved, as well as the broader implications for the scandal as a whole. Additionally, it could provide insights into the ongoing legal battles surrounding other defendants and how this case fits into the larger narrative of college admissions practices.
